name: Ball Race 3D
description:
Ball Race 3D is a newly developed web game by One Editor Games.

You can play this game on android as well as on pc.

To play on phone,
Touch left, right part of your phone.

To play on pc,
Use left, right keys on keyboard.

Some buttons are disabled, as they are only available for android build, which will launch soon.

So, without further instructions, enjoy and explore game.

If you love our game, check out other games.  This is our discord server.
